https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ncvlKofZOTwLtqUwaiWBWv0R971.jpg Charles and Pierrot are inseparable. When Charles takes early retirement, it seems the world is their oyster. They can spend even more time together. Their motto is simple: "Make the most of life and have fun!». They fill their days with abundant imagination, under the tender and sometimes worried gaze of the women in their lives… 60 Going On 12
